docs.title: FastAPI MongoDB Utilities
docs.text: This site contains the project documentation for the fastapi_mongodb_utils project that is a Python library to be used in projects with FastAPI and MongoDB.

docs.title: Project Overview
docs.text: The purpose of this library is to provide support utilities when working with FastAPI and MongoDB.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text: Install using your favorite package manager poetry add fastapi-mongodb-utils or pip install fastapi-mongodb-utils

docs.title: datetime_to_iso8601_with_z_suffix(value)
docs.text:
Convert datetime to ISO 8601 with Z suffix.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default value datetime

datetime object to be converted.

required

Returns:

Name Type Description str str

ISO 8601 formatted datetime with Z suffix.

docs.title: days_since(timestamp)
docs.text: Get the number of days since a timestamp.

docs.title: is_today_not_in_days_of_week(days_of_week)
docs.text: Check if today is not in the days of week.

docs.title: normalize_str_datetime(value)
docs.text: Convert string to normalized datetime in str.

docs.title: now(tz=timezone.utc, **kwargs)
docs.text:
Get current datetime with timezone.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default tz timezone

timezone.

utc **kwargs dict

Arbitrary keyword arguments that will be passed to timedelta.

{}

Returns:

Name Type Description datetime datetime

current datetime object with timezone and offset.
